I was skeptical that this was real but I can that it is after watching it. Thank you, KaLaNco69. Scene cappers always neglect this amazing show and only release it with the Monday repeat, 3 days after original air.

The only thing I want to point out is that the audio is a little bit off. Not enough to be a problem watching, but it is noticeable. I'm no encoding expert, but it might be looking into for you next release.

Regardless, thank you for getting this out so quick! Its a shame that Scene Groups neglect it.

A: 7 or 8
